message: Bob, I have a product that I believe will be of significant value to your company. Given your expertise in this field, I'm confident it would be a great asset. I'm offering it to you for $1,250,000.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to my company.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your perspective, $1,100,000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product for your company.  I'm willing to come down to $1,175,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll see the significant ROI this product will bring.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $1,125,000?
